title: The Grateful Dead - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/28/18
itunes:title: The Grateful Dead - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/28/18
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and famed former San Francisco Chronicle music critic Joel Selvin discuss his new book chronicling the life, times and conflicts of the legendary rock group the Grateful Dead.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
